title: Emails Sent or Recieved by Redacted Address

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. All emails sent to or from the redacted CISA email address listed in the email with the subject line "Misinformation Reports," posted at the following link. https://twitter.com/christina_bobb/status/1599399706613923840.
The time period for this request is Jan. 21, 2021 until the present.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

AFL requests expedited processing for this request because this is a matter of widespread and exceptional media interest in which there exist possible questions about the government's integrity which affect public confidence.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

AFL

title: Request for Mayorkas Emails Related to the Email Titled "Misinformation Reports"

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1.  All emails sent to or from Secretary Mayorkas, Kristie Canegallo, Jennifer Higgins or Karen Olick, that discuss the email with the subject line "Misinformation Reports," posted at the following link. https://twitter.com/christina_bobb/status/1599399706613923840.
The time period for this request is Jan. 1 - Jan 21, 2021.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

AFL requests expedited processing for this request because this is a matter of widespread and exceptional media interest in which there exist possible questions about the government's integrity which affect public confidence.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

AFL

title: Emails to or from gov@twitter.com and misinformation@cisecurity.org

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All emails sent to and from gov@twitter.com and misinformation@cisecurity.org by any CISA employee.  
The time period for this request is Jan. 21, 2021 until the present.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

AFL requests expedited processing for this request because this is a matter of widespread and exceptional media interest in which there exist possible questions about the government's integrity which affect public confidence.  These email addresses recently appeared on a publicly disclosed email thread that included the Arizona Secretary of State's staff and a CISA employee, requesting the censorship of several Tweets.  The fact that CISA appears to be involved in this behavior is concerning, and raises questions about government integrity.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

AFL

title: Request for the Email Titled "Misinformation Reports" dated Jan. 7, 2021

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Request for the Email Titled "Misinformation Reports" dated Jan. 7, 2021
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1.  An unredacted copy of the email with the subject line "Misinformation Reports," that is posted at the following link.  The time period for this request is Jan. 7, 2021.
https://twitter.com/christina_bobb/status/1599399706613923840.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

AFL requests expedited processing for this request, because this is a matter of widespread and exceptional media interest in which there exist possible questions about the government's integrity which affect public confidence.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the FOIA requires.

Sincerely,

AFL
